```{r, echo = F}
set.seed(1)
```


```{r}

library(metadym)

# Global model parameters

nsteps = 500
N = 100
D = 2
R = 50

pars = getDefaultParameters()


# Run the model

out = main(XY,E,Y0,pars,A,nsteps)

```

Plot output / optionally returns statistics

```{r, fig.width=10, fig.height=10}
statistics <- plotOutput(out)
```
